pullrequest.title: Monitor SRC ihmc controller and harness status

content.html:
I see both simulator_ready and harness_status are not associated to any round. Should they instead be part of the round_xx being launched ?
I can imagine a srcsimulation structure with this data:

{
  round_1: {
    simulator_ready: 1
    harness: 
    score: xxx
  }
  round_2 : { 
    ready: 0, 
    harness: -1
  }
}

Maybe having the info this way, we can more easily find with buttons to reenable in case of an simulator launch failure ? (in relation to this , and to disable "already launched rounds" , I was thinking of disabling those the Run buttons for those rounds for which we have round_xx in the srcsimulation record) . What do you think ?
